```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
roll_dice <- function() {
mydice <- 1:6
mydices <- sample(mydice, size = 2, replace = TRUE)
sum(mydices)
}
roll_dice()
```

```{r}
more_dice <- replicate(10000, roll_dice())
qplot(more_dice, binwidth = 1)
```
